SENT.plain: One of the arterial complications of Behçet's disease, arterial false aneurysms, has a sudden onset of symptoms and high mortality risk if left untreated
Four cases with arterial pseudoaneurysms of 3 male patients is reported and the choice of surgical intervention is emphasized
It is underlined that PTFE grafts are the graft of choice in reconstructions for arterial complications of Behçet's disease
